description: This is a request for proposal for a Klas Voyager system or equivalent for a secure remote access solution for the Privy Council Office (PCO). The solution must provide a secure and reliable remote access to the networks utilized by the PCO and communications equipment related to business continuity.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: SSC-22-00020466/T

## Tender Overview
A Request for Proposal (RFP) was published on October 19, 2022, for the provision of a bespoke secure remote access solution across various networks utilized by the Privy Council Office (PCO) and communications equipment related to business continuity. This solicitation is solicited in accordance with the Revised Supply Manual.

## Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: SSC-22-00020466/T
* Amendment Number: 1
* Tender Closing Date: November 2, 2022, at 15:00:00
* End User: Shared Services Canada

## Goods and Services Information
* GSN (Goods and Services Number): N7025405, N7030, N7035
* Goods and Services Description: Local Area Networks, Systems and Components, ADP Software, and ADP Support Equipment

## Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the following international trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Tender Address and Contact
* Contracting Entity Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* End User Entities Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* Contact Information: Please refer to the Solicitation Document for contact information.

## Supporting Documents
Links to downloadable documents are available from the [Shared Services Canada portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9A52B6AB-9DC8-4B84-8041-2D3B118A3109) in English and [Shared Services Canada portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/874E1FFE-31E8-4E9C-A595-D9768323C5FA) in French.
